title: Inari Konkon: Vol. 1
description: A comedy-romance story that unfolds in Fushimi, Kyoto!In Fushimi, Kyoto, a jr. high school girl named Inari, Fushimi has a crush on a boy, and acts a little foolish in trying to tell him her feelings. In a strange turn of events, Inari is able to change shape to the person she wants to be, and her love story in Kyoto takes many drastic turns for the better and worse!
author: Morohe Yoshida
